title: Can we get some info on that Poppy rework
body: Its been a year since the Sion rework. Last i read they had her kit locked down just waiting for the art side of the project to finish, but that was a few months ago. Now i know that the art side is alot of work but could we get a % complete on it?

replies.body:
Everyone talks about the sion level rework, pfft poppy is in a league of her own on that aspect. sion took like 6 months.
Poppy is a procrastination fest we're up to 8 months without a word other than -big punch in small package~

I think its one of these things where league likes to kinda hype stuff up and then keep it a happy medium and what with the new champ i don't expect it for a long time.
